mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEM_SORT WHERE M_ID=#{mId} AND M_STATUS='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET (M_NAME, M_NICKNAME, M_PHONE, M_EMAIL, M_ADDRESS, M_BIRTHDAY) = (${mName}, ${mNickname}, ${mPhone}, ${mEmail}, ${mAddress}, ${mBirthday}) WHERE M_NO = #{mNo}
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET M_STATUS='N' WHERE M_ID = #{mId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RESVE R, TB_RSTRNT_INFO I WHERE R.R_NO = I.R_NO
SELECT R.RSVDE, I.R_NAME, R.VISITR_CO, R.RESVE_AMOUNT FROM TB_RESVE R, TB_RSTRNT_INFO I WHERE R.R_NO = I.R_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SETLE S, TB_RSTRNT_INFO R, TB_GNRL_MEMBER G WHERE R.M_NO = G.M_NO AND G.M_NO = S.M_NO ORDER BY S.SETLE_DE
SELECT S.SETLE_DE, R.R_NAME, S.STPRC, G.M_POINT FROM TB_SETLE S, TB_RSTRNT_INFO R, TB_GNRL_MEMBER G WHERE R.M_NO = G.M_NO AND G.M_NO = S.M_NO ORDER BY S.SETLE_DE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SETLE S, TB_POINT P, TB_RSTRNT_INFO R, TB_GNRL_MEMBER G WHERE R.M_NO = G.M_NO AND G.M_NO = S.M_NO AND S.M_NO = P.M_NO ORDER BY P.POINT_DATE

SELECT P.POINT_DATE, R.R_NAME, P.POINT_HISTORY, G.M_POINT FROM TB_SETLE S, TB_POINT P, TB_RSTRNT_INFO R, TB_GNRL_MEMBER G WHERE R.M_NO = G.M_NO AND G.M_NO = S.M_NO AND S.M_NO = P.M_NO ORDER BY P.POINT_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD B, TB_GNRL_MEMBER G WHERE B.M_NO = G.M_NO ORDER BY B_ENROLL_DATE
SELECT B.B_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_ENROLL_DATE, B.B_CATEGORY, B.B_TYPE FROM TB_BOARD B, TB_GNRL_MEMBER G WHERE B.M_NO = G.M_NO ORDER BY B_ENROLL_DATE
